title: Nizi Project
overview: Nizi Project (Rainbow Project) is a Survival show from JYP Entertainment and Sony Music Japan to find girls across 8 cities in Japan, LA and Hawaii, to hopefully debut a new JYPE Japanese girl group at the end of 2020. 26 trainees will be picked to have passed. Only if they have filled the 4 spaces in their pendent, they will enter Korean training for 6 months.The name Nizi Project means "various people carrying different colours like a rainbow will come together as one group and shine a beautiful light".
